modName: NEO's Selene BodySlide CBBE HDT Conversion
summary: A conversion of NEO's Selene armor to Bodyslide using CBBE as the reference body.
descriptionHtml:
First and foremost, this mod is posted with permission of the original author, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/813611/?]neovinci[/url].

---

This is a BodySlide conversion for his amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/?]Selene Armor[/url], which is required. This file only contains the bodyslide data, not the raw armor files. You can download it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/?]here[/url]. This conversion uses [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's CBBE[/url] as the reference body, which you can get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]here[/url].

What's inside? Why create another BodySlide? I have some different styles of the main armor piece that you may enjoy. let's review them together.

[list]
[*]Boots and Bracers. Only one option for each, and self explanatory.
[*]Armor, no HDT.
[*]Armor, full HDT; breasts and butt.
[*]Armor, HDT, breasts only. Jiggle-physics is as only as time, but I find the butt physics to be a bit much, so this is jiggle boobies only.
[*]Armor, Special breasts HDT and butt HDT. What is special breasts HDT? I painted the breasts weights onto the shirt area not held down by the corset, to make it a very, very small bit more realistic. Recommended with push-up enabled, this setting is pretty good for juggy characters.
[*]As above, but no butt HDT. I included this for the reason stated above, I think the butt HDT can be a bit much.
[/list]
Because this armor covers the entire body and shows no skin, the reference body is not actually copied into the armor when it's exports from BodySlide, so there should be very little, if any, clipping issues. The collar is very high, so sometimes the lower chin can clip through that, but I don't find it to be noticeable unless you're looking for is specifically. I may release an update if I can find a good way to fix this.

And that's about it. Enjoy! Feedback or bug reports welcome.


Addendum: I filled out a thank you's section, but it was truncated I guess? So:
Thanks for neovinci for this armor.
Thanks to Caliente for the CBBE body and for the awesome BodySlide tool.
Thanks to Nexus Mods as always.
And thanks to Bethesda for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.
author: volatica
